Detailed Description

CmiProvider is the provider to retrieve the CMI parameters set in the EF-CMI file. Please refer to the GSM specification 11.11 chapter 10.5.13 and 10.5.16.

An instance of this class is part of the Apoxi Data Control. A pointer to this provider can be retrieved from the main provider via the id:

c_cmi_provider_id

Following column ids are defined: c_cmi_alpha_id :WStringType: Alpha identifier of the CMI record c_cmi_id :NumberType: Comparison Method Identifier -> cast to (UINT8)

NOTE: Please do not instantiate this class.
